title: How tempting is it to get a fake degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: Consider for a moment that you submitted a photocopy of a fake degree. And you got hired. Later on the human resources (HR) department hires a young kid for the summer. Said young employee is told to take all the new hires, say for the last year, and validate each with the school represented on the degree. When your degree is denied by the school the young kid will go to the HR manager who most likely will do a double review with the school. You don’t exist in that school’s program. Your manager is informed that your degree is fake. The manager will most likely visit you at your desk, order you to remove any personal property, remove your badge if you were issued one, and escort you out the door while singing “You’ve been fired, you’ve been fired.” Next, if you were working in a community where several firms similar to the one that fired you, car sales, retail stores, hospitals, whatever. The word will spread around, somewhat quickly, that you are a liar.

as tempting as it is robbing a bank. why in the world would you pay to have a piece of paper that says you know how to do things you don’t know how to do? it will be evident it’s fake the first day you work, if you even make it there; chances are a competent interviewer will see through the fakeness at the interview.
